0.text:
Innate: Aurelion Sol's damaging abilities against enemies grant him stacks of Stardust, which improve each of his abilities. The amount of Stardust collected by each ability may vary by target.
 Breath of Light: Bursts deal bonus magic damage equal to (0.031% Stardust stacks) of the target's maximum health.
 Astral Flight: Range is increased by 62.5% Stardust stacks.
 Singularity: Outer and inner radius increased by 15% Stardust stacks, and execution threshold increased by 2.6% Stardust stacks.
 Falling Star and  The Skies Descend: Effect radius increased by 15% Stardust stacks.
0.html:
Innate: Aurelion Sol's damaging abilities against enemies grant him stacks of Stardust, which improve each of his abilities. The amount of Stardust collected by each ability may vary by target.

  • Breath of Light: Bursts deal bonus magic damage equal to (0.031% Stardust stacks) of the target's maximum health.
  • Astral Flight: Range is increased by 62.5% Stardust stacks.
  • Singularity: Outer and inner radius increased by 15% Stardust stacks, and execution threshold increased by 2.6% Stardust stacks.
  • Falling Star and The Skies Descend: Effect radius increased by 15% Stardust stacks.
markedPassages: Breath of Light
Astral Flight
Singularity
Falling Star
The Skies Descend

0.text: Active: Aurelion Sol  charges for up to 3.25 seconds to exhale a beam of starfire, during which he can steer the beam in the target direction. The beam collides with the first enemy hit,  reveals them, and deals them magic damage every 0.125 seconds, reduced to 50% for other surrounding enemies hit by the beam.
0.html: Active: Aurelion Sol charges for up to 3.25 seconds to exhale a beam of starfire, during which he can steer the beam in the target direction. The beam collides with the first enemy hit, reveals them, and deals them magic damage every 0.125 seconds, reduced to 50% for other surrounding enemies hit by the beam.
markedPassages: charges
reveals

1.text: Breath of Light can be recast within the duration, and does so automatically afterwards.
1.html: Breath of Light can be recast within the duration, and does so automatically afterwards.

2.text: For each second that the beam continuously damages the same enemy, it bursts to deal  bonus magic damage and grants 1 Stardust if the target is a  champion. The damage based on the target's health ratio is capped at 300 against  monsters.
2.html: For each second that the beam continuously damages the same enemy, it bursts to deal bonus magic damage and grants 1 Stardust if the target is a champion. The damage based on the target's health ratio is capped at 300 against monsters.

0.content: 20 − 40 (based on level) (+ 40 / 50 / 60 / 70 / 80) (+ 40% AP) (+ (0.031% Stardust stacks) of target's maximum health

markedPassages: champion
monsters
(+ (0.031% Stardust stacks) of target's maximum health
(+ (0.031% Stardust stacks) of target's maximum health

3.text: Recast: Aurelion Sol ends Breath of Light early.

4.text: At rank 5, Breath of Light's channel duration lasts for as long as Aurelion Sol can pay its mana cost.
4.html: At rank 5, Breath of Light's channel duration lasts for as long as Aurelion Sol can pay its mana cost.

0.text: Active: Aurelion Sol  dashes in the target direction and resets  Breath of Light's  cooldown. While in flight, he has  unobstructed vision and  Breath of Light has no cooldown and maximum channel duration and its flat damage is increased, but Astral Flight's dash speed is reduced by 50% during its channel.
0.html: Active: Aurelion Sol dashes in the target direction and resets Breath of Light's  cooldown. While in flight, he has unobstructed vision and Breath of Light has no cooldown and maximum channel duration and its flat damage is increased, but Astral Flight's dash speed is reduced by 50% during its channel.

0.marker: BREATH OF LIGHT FLAT DAMAGE MODIFIER:

markedPassages: dashes
Breath of Light's
cooldown
unobstructed vision
Breath of Light
Breath of Light

1.text: Aurelion Sol will be  knocked down by any  immobilizing crowd control during the dash.
1.html: Aurelion Sol will be knocked down by any immobilizing crowd control during the dash.
markedPassages: knocked down
immobilizing
possibleConcerningAbilities: Aurelion Sol will be  knocked down by any  immobilizing crowd control during the dash.

2.text: Astral Flight can be recast after 0.5 seconds during the dash, and does so automatically after reaching the destination.
2.html: Astral Flight can be recast after 0.5 seconds during the dash, and does so automatically after reaching the destination.

3.text: Recast: Aurelion Sol ends Astral Flight early.

4.text: Scoring a champion  takedown within 3 seconds of damaging them reduces Astral Flight's  current cooldown by 90% of its total cooldown.
4.html: Scoring a champion takedown within 3 seconds of damaging them reduces Astral Flight's  current cooldown by 90% of its total cooldown.
markedPassages: takedown
current cooldown

5.text: Aurelion Sol will not dash if he is  immobilized or  grounded during the cast time. He can cast any of his abilities during the dash.  Breath of Light's channel will be interrupted if Astral Flight ends or  Singularity is cast during the flight, but the ability will automatically be cast afterwards. Astral Flight will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
5.html: Aurelion Sol will not dash if he is immobilized or grounded during the cast time. He can cast any of his abilities during the dash. Breath of Light's channel will be interrupted if Astral Flight ends or Singularity is cast during the flight, but the ability will automatically be cast afterwards. Astral Flight will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
markedPassages: immobilized
grounded
Breath of Light's
Singularity
possibleConcerningAbilities: Aurelion Sol will not dash if he is  immobilized or  grounded during the cast time. He can cast any of his abilities during the dash.  Breath of Light's channel will be interrupted if Astral Flight ends or  Singularity is cast during the flight, but the ability will automatically be cast afterwards. Astral Flight will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

4.text:
EFFECT RADIUS:  √(275² + 16.93²  ×  STARDUST) / √(137.5² + 8.46²  ×  STARDUST)
 √(275² + 16.93²  ×  STARDUST) / √(137.5² + 8.46²  ×  STARDUST)

0.text: Active: Aurelion Sol blasts the target location, conjuring a black hole after a 0.5-second delay that lasts for 5 seconds, grants  sight of the area, and deals magic damage every 0.25 seconds to enemies within the area.
0.html: Active: Aurelion Sol blasts the target location, conjuring a black hole after a 0.5-second delay that lasts for 5 seconds, grants sight of the area, and deals magic damage every 0.25 seconds to enemies within the area.
markedPassages: sight

1.text: Enemies in the black hole are  dragged toward its center over the duration. Non-epic monster targets within the center that are below 5% (+ 2.6% Stardust stacks) of their maximum health are also  executed. Additionally, non-champions affected have their movement speed reduced to 0.
1.html: Enemies in the black hole are dragged toward its center over the duration. Non-epic monster targets within the center that are below 5% (+ 2.6% Stardust stacks) of their maximum health are also executed. Additionally, non-champions affected have their movement speed reduced to 0.
markedPassages: dragged
5% (+ 2.6% Stardust stacks) of their maximum health
5% (+ 2.6% Stardust stacks) of their maximum health
executed

2.text:
After Singularity ends, Aurelion Sol is granted 1 Stardust for each continuous second that enemy champions were inside it, and a varying amount of Stardust for enemies that died while within the area:
Champions and epic monsters grant 5 Stardust.
Large minions and monsters grant 3 Stardust.
Small minions and monsters grant 1 Stardust.
2.html:
After Singularity ends, Aurelion Sol is granted 1 Stardust for each continuous second that enemy champions were inside it, and a varying amount of Stardust for enemies that died while within the area:

  • Champions and epic monsters grant 5 Stardust.
  • Large minions and monsters grant 3 Stardust.
  • Small minions and monsters grant 1 Stardust.

0.text: Active: Aurelion Sol calls down a star to impact the target location after 1.25 seconds, dealing magic damage to enemies hit and  stunning them for 1.25 seconds. Falling Star grants 5 Stardust for each enemy champion hit.
0.html: Active: Aurelion Sol calls down a star to impact the target location after 1.25 seconds, dealing magic damage to enemies hit and stunning them for 1.25 seconds. Falling Star grants 5 Stardust for each enemy champion hit.
markedPassages: stunning

1.text: Once Falling Star has been learned, gathering 75 Stardust causes the next cast of Falling Star to transform into  The Skies Descend instead, empowering the impact with new effects.
1.html: Once Falling Star has been learned, gathering 75 Stardust causes the next cast of Falling Star to transform into The Skies Descend instead, empowering the impact with new effects.
markedPassages: The Skies Descend

0.text: Active: Aurelion Sol summons an enormous star to impact the target location after 2 seconds, dealing  25% increased damage, exploding in a larger radius, and  knocking up enemies hit for 1.25 seconds.
0.html: Active: Aurelion Sol summons an enormous star to impact the target location after 2 seconds, dealing 25% increased damage, exploding in a larger radius, and knocking up enemies hit for 1.25 seconds.
markedPassages: knocking up

1.text: Upon impact, a massive shockwave is unleashed which rapidly expands outward from the impact location over 3 seconds, dealing  magic damage to enemy champions and epic  monsters hit, and  slowing all enemies hit by 50% for 1 second and  revealing them for 1.5 seconds.
1.html: Upon impact, a massive shockwave is unleashed which rapidly expands outward from the impact location over 3 seconds, dealing magic damage to enemy champions and epic monsters hit, and slowing all enemies hit by 50% for 1 second and revealing them for 1.5 seconds.
markedPassages: monsters
slowing
revealing

markedPassages: 5% (+ 2.6% Stardust stacks) of their maximum health

textContent.text:
After Singularity ends, Aurelion Sol is granted 1 Stardust for each continuous second that enemy champions were inside it, and a varying amount of Stardust for enemies that died while within the area:
Champions and epic monsters grant 5 Stardust.
Large minions and monsters grant 3 Stardust.
Small minions and monsters grant 1 Stardust.
textContent.html:
After Singularity ends, Aurelion Sol is granted 1 Stardust for each continuous second that enemy champions were inside it, and a varying amount of Stardust for enemies that died while within the area:

  • Champions and epic monsters grant 5 Stardust.
  • Large minions and monsters grant 3 Stardust.
  • Small minions and monsters grant 1 Stardust.

textContent.text: Active: Aurelion Sol calls down a star to impact the target location after 1.25 seconds, dealing magic damage to enemies hit and  stunning them for 1.25 seconds. Falling Star grants 5 Stardust for each enemy champion hit.
textContent.html: Active: Aurelion Sol calls down a star to impact the target location after 1.25 seconds, dealing magic damage to enemies hit and stunning them for 1.25 seconds. Falling Star grants 5 Stardust for each enemy champion hit.

skillTabs.concerningText: Active: Aurelion Sol calls down a star to impact the target location after 1.25 seconds, dealing magic damage to enemies hit and  stunning them for 1.25 seconds. Falling Star grants 5 Stardust for each enemy champion hit.

textContent.text: Once Falling Star has been learned, gathering 75 Stardust causes the next cast of Falling Star to transform into  The Skies Descend instead, empowering the impact with new effects.
textContent.html: Once Falling Star has been learned, gathering 75 Stardust causes the next cast of Falling Star to transform into The Skies Descend instead, empowering the impact with new effects.

textContent.text: Active: Aurelion Sol summons an enormous star to impact the target location after 2 seconds, dealing  25% increased damage, exploding in a larger radius, and  knocking up enemies hit for 1.25 seconds.
textContent.html: Active: Aurelion Sol summons an enormous star to impact the target location after 2 seconds, dealing 25% increased damage, exploding in a larger radius, and knocking up enemies hit for 1.25 seconds.

skillTabs.concerningText: Active: Aurelion Sol summons an enormous star to impact the target location after 2 seconds, dealing  25% increased damage, exploding in a larger radius, and  knocking up enemies hit for 1.25 seconds.

markedPassages: knocking up

textContent.text: Upon impact, a massive shockwave is unleashed which rapidly expands outward from the impact location over 3 seconds, dealing  magic damage to enemy champions and epic  monsters hit, and  slowing all enemies hit by 50% for 1 second and  revealing them for 1.5 seconds.
textContent.html: Upon impact, a massive shockwave is unleashed which rapidly expands outward from the impact location over 3 seconds, dealing magic damage to enemy champions and epic monsters hit, and slowing all enemies hit by 50% for 1 second and revealing them for 1.5 seconds.

skillTabs.concerningText: Upon impact, a massive shockwave is unleashed which rapidly expands outward from the impact location over 3 seconds, dealing  magic damage to enemy champions and epic  monsters hit, and  slowing all enemies hit by 50% for 1 second and  revealing them for 1.5 seconds.

markedPassages: monsters
slowing
revealing

textContent.text:
Innate: Aurelion Sol's damaging abilities against enemies grant him stacks of Stardust, which improve each of his abilities. The amount of Stardust collected by each ability may vary by target.
 Breath of Light: Bursts deal bonus magic damage equal to (0.031% Stardust stacks) of the target's maximum health.
 Astral Flight: Range is increased by 62.5% Stardust stacks.
 Singularity: Outer and inner radius increased by 15% Stardust stacks, and execution threshold increased by 2.6% Stardust stacks.
 Falling Star and  The Skies Descend: Effect radius increased by 15% Stardust stacks.
textContent.html:
Innate: Aurelion Sol's damaging abilities against enemies grant him stacks of Stardust, which improve each of his abilities. The amount of Stardust collected by each ability may vary by target.

  • Breath of Light: Bursts deal bonus magic damage equal to (0.031% Stardust stacks) of the target's maximum health.
  • Astral Flight: Range is increased by 62.5% Stardust stacks.
  • Singularity: Outer and inner radius increased by 15% Stardust stacks, and execution threshold increased by 2.6% Stardust stacks.
  • Falling Star and The Skies Descend: Effect radius increased by 15% Stardust stacks.

textContent.text: Active: Aurelion Sol  charges for up to 3.25 seconds to exhale a beam of starfire, during which he can steer the beam in the target direction. The beam collides with the first enemy hit,  reveals them, and deals them magic damage every 0.125 seconds, reduced to 50% for other surrounding enemies hit by the beam.
textContent.html: Active: Aurelion Sol charges for up to 3.25 seconds to exhale a beam of starfire, during which he can steer the beam in the target direction. The beam collides with the first enemy hit, reveals them, and deals them magic damage every 0.125 seconds, reduced to 50% for other surrounding enemies hit by the beam.

skillTabs.concerningText: Active: Aurelion Sol  charges for up to 3.25 seconds to exhale a beam of starfire, during which he can steer the beam in the target direction. The beam collides with the first enemy hit,  reveals them, and deals them magic damage every 0.125 seconds, reduced to 50% for other surrounding enemies hit by the beam.

Active: Aurelion Sol  charges for up to 3.25 seconds to exhale a beam of starfire, during which he can steer the beam in the target direction. The beam collides with the first enemy hit,  reveals them, and deals them magic damage every 0.125 seconds, reduced to 50% for other surrounding enemies hit by the beam.

textContent.text: Breath of Light can be recast within the duration, and does so automatically afterwards.
textContent.html: Breath of Light can be recast within the duration, and does so automatically afterwards.

textContent.text: For each second that the beam continuously damages the same enemy, it bursts to deal  bonus magic damage and grants 1 Stardust if the target is a  champion. The damage based on the target's health ratio is capped at 300 against  monsters.
textContent.html: For each second that the beam continuously damages the same enemy, it bursts to deal bonus magic damage and grants 1 Stardust if the target is a champion. The damage based on the target's health ratio is capped at 300 against monsters.

skillTabs.concerningText: For each second that the beam continuously damages the same enemy, it bursts to deal  bonus magic damage and grants 1 Stardust if the target is a  champion. The damage based on the target's health ratio is capped at 300 against  monsters.

markedPassages: (+ (0.031% Stardust stacks) of target's maximum health

textContent.text: Recast: Aurelion Sol ends Breath of Light early.
textContent.html: Recast: Aurelion Sol ends Breath of Light early.

textContent.text: At rank 5, Breath of Light's channel duration lasts for as long as Aurelion Sol can pay its mana cost.
textContent.html: At rank 5, Breath of Light's channel duration lasts for as long as Aurelion Sol can pay its mana cost.

textContent.text: Active: Aurelion Sol  dashes in the target direction and resets  Breath of Light's  cooldown. While in flight, he has  unobstructed vision and  Breath of Light has no cooldown and maximum channel duration and its flat damage is increased, but Astral Flight's dash speed is reduced by 50% during its channel.
textContent.html: Active: Aurelion Sol dashes in the target direction and resets Breath of Light's  cooldown. While in flight, he has unobstructed vision and Breath of Light has no cooldown and maximum channel duration and its flat damage is increased, but Astral Flight's dash speed is reduced by 50% during its channel.

origin: breath of light flat damage modifier:
skillTabs.marker: breath of light flat damage modifier:
skillTabs.concerningText: Active: Aurelion Sol  dashes in the target direction and resets  Breath of Light's  cooldown. While in flight, he has  unobstructed vision and  Breath of Light has no cooldown and maximum channel duration and its flat damage is increased, but Astral Flight's dash speed is reduced by 50% during its channel.

textContent.text: Aurelion Sol will be  knocked down by any  immobilizing crowd control during the dash.
textContent.html: Aurelion Sol will be knocked down by any immobilizing crowd control during the dash.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Aurelion Sol will be  knocked down by any  immobilizing crowd control during the dash.

concerningSkills.skillName: aurelion sol will be knocked down by any immobilizing crowd control during the dash.

textContent.text: Astral Flight can be recast after 0.5 seconds during the dash, and does so automatically after reaching the destination.
textContent.html: Astral Flight can be recast after 0.5 seconds during the dash, and does so automatically after reaching the destination.

textContent.text: Recast: Aurelion Sol ends Astral Flight early.
textContent.html: Recast: Aurelion Sol ends Astral Flight early.

textContent.text: Scoring a champion  takedown within 3 seconds of damaging them reduces Astral Flight's  current cooldown by 90% of its total cooldown.
textContent.html: Scoring a champion takedown within 3 seconds of damaging them reduces Astral Flight's  current cooldown by 90% of its total cooldown.

textContent.text: Aurelion Sol will not dash if he is  immobilized or  grounded during the cast time. He can cast any of his abilities during the dash.  Breath of Light's channel will be interrupted if Astral Flight ends or  Singularity is cast during the flight, but the ability will automatically be cast afterwards. Astral Flight will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
textContent.html: Aurelion Sol will not dash if he is immobilized or grounded during the cast time. He can cast any of his abilities during the dash. Breath of Light's channel will be interrupted if Astral Flight ends or Singularity is cast during the flight, but the ability will automatically be cast afterwards. Astral Flight will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

Breath of Light's channel will be interrupted if Astral Flight ends or  Singularity is cast during the flight, but the ability will automatically be cast afterwards. Astral Flight will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+60 ability power
+400 health
+400 mana

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique: This item gains 20 bonus health, 20 bonus mana, and 4 ability power every minute, up to 10 times, for a maximum of 200 bonus health, 200 bonus mana, and 40 ability power. Upon reaching maximum stacks, gain a level that preserves your current experience (cap remains at level 18) and increase all effects of Eternity by 50%.
Unique – Eternity: Restore mana equal to 7% of pre-mitigation damage taken from champions, and heal for an amount equal to 25% of mana spent, up to 20 per cast. Toggled abilities can only heal for up to 20 per second. For every 200 healing or mana restored this way, gain 35% bonus movement speed that decays over 3 seconds.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 ability haste.
passive.originText: UNIQUE: This item gains 20 bonus health, 20 bonus mana, and 4 ability power every minute, up to 10 times, for a maximum of 200 bonus health, 200 bonus mana, and 40 ability power. Upon reaching maximum stacks, gain a level that preserves your current experience (cap remains at level 18) and increase all effects of Eternity by 50%.

Transforms into Seraph's Embrace at 360 bonus mana.
